name: Peter The Part Time Poltergeist (BCU GGJ Winner)
name_original: Peter The Part Time Poltergeist (BCU GGJ Winner)
description:
Winner of the BCU Global Game Jam Judges favourite award

Play as Peter, Transform into the Poltergeist. Beat the platformer levels in this story-driven adventure and get one of 3 endings

THE GAME TAKES A FEW SECONDS TO LOA

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Transform
  • E - Open levels
  • R - Restart Level
  • Esc - Return to hub world

Credits:

  • Cory Arnett-O'Brien
  • Zak Ahmed
  • Ben Miller

Music

  • By AdhesiveWombat  youtube
  • By kevin macleod youtube
